title: Data Analyst
job_overview:
Key Responsibilities:
Create and maintain daily, weekly, and monthly reports using Excel and Google Sheets

Build dynamic dashboards, pivot tables, charts, slicers, and lookup tables

Maintain data integrity across multiple reports and reconcile inconsistencies

Import/export data from sources like CSVs, Google Sheets, JotForm, CRMs, or EMRs

Clean, organize, and validate large datasets

Work with team leads to understand reporting needs and implement clear solutions

Assist in preparing board-level summaries, performance tracking, and productivity reports

Ideal Candidate Has:
Advanced Excel skills: pivot tables, VLOOKUP/XLOOKUP, INDEX-MATCH, conditional formatting, filters, array formulas, Power Query, etc.

Strong Google Sheets experience

Excellent attention to detail and accuracy

Ability to clean and organize raw data

Strong analytical and problem-solving mindset

Comfortable handling healthcare, scheduling, or operational data

Bonus: experience with tools like Looker Studio, Airtable, or database queries (not required)

Excellent written and verbal English communication skills



We’re looking for someone who lives and breathes spreadsheets and understands how to turn raw data into clear, actionable insights. If that’s you — we’d love to meet you.
